mapper.select: select * from a_hotwordsbasicinfo ORDER BY UpdateDateTime desc LIMIT 0,20

select a.*, (select m.WebsiteName from m_websiteinfo m where m.Website_ID = a.Website_ID) WebsiteName, (select count(1) from a_articlebasicinfo b where a.SimilarArticlesNo=b.SimilarArticlesNo and a.Article_ID!=b.Article_ID) sim_cnt, (select count(1) from m_mycollection c where c.Article_ID=a.Article_ID ) collcnt, (select count(1) from a_userearlywarningarticleinfo d where d.Article_ID=a.Article_ID and d.User_ID=#{CreateUser}) yj_cnt from a_articlebasicinfo a,A_ForthcomingBasicInfo b,A_ArticleForthcomingInfo c where a.Article_ID=c.Article_ID and b.Keyword_ID =c.Keyword_ID and b.Keyword_ID=#{HotWord} and not exists (select 1 from a_userdeletearticleinfo d where d.Article_ID=a.Article_ID and d.User_ID=#{CreateUser}) ORDER BY UpdateDateTime desc limit #{l_pre},#{rowSize}

select a.*, (select m.WebsiteName from m_websiteinfo m where m.Website_ID = a.Website_ID) WebsiteName, (select count(1) from a_articlebasicinfo b where a.SimilarArticlesNo=b.SimilarArticlesNo and a.Article_ID!=b.Article_ID) sim_cnt, (select count(1) from m_mycollection c where c.Article_ID=a.Article_ID ) collcnt, (select count(1) from a_userearlywarningarticleinfo d where d.Article_ID=a.Article_ID and d.User_ID=#{CreateUser}) yj_cnt from a_articlebasicinfo a,A_HotWordsBasicInfo b,A_ArticleHotWordsInfo c where a.Article_ID=c.Article_ID and b.HotWord_ID=c.HotWord_ID and b.HotWord_ID=#{HotWord} and not exists (select 1 from a_userdeletearticleinfo d where d.Article_ID=a.Article_ID and d.User_ID=#{CreateUser}) ORDER BY UpdateDateTime desc limit #{l_pre},#{rowSize}

select * from (select a.Article_ID,a.ArticleTitle,'1' as flag from a_articlebasicinfo a where not exists (select 1 from a_userdeletearticleinfo b where b.Article_ID=a.Article_ID and b.User_ID=#{userid}) ORDER BY a.Releasetime desc limit 0,10) aa union ALL select * from (select distinct a.Article_ID,a.ArticleTitle,'2' as flag from a_articlebasicinfo a,a_userearlywarningarticleinfo b where a.Article_ID = b.Article_ID and b.User_ID=#{userid} and not exists (select 1 from a_userdeletearticleinfo c where c.Article_ID=a.Article_ID and b.User_ID=#{userid}) ORDER BY a.Releasetime desc limit 0,10) bb union ALL select * from (select a.Article_ID,a.ArticleTitle,'3' as flag from a_articlebasicinfo a where a.EmotionDivision='2' and not exists (select 1 from a_userdeletearticleinfo b where b.Article_ID=a.Article_ID and b.User_ID=#{userid}) ORDER BY a.Releasetime desc limit 0,10) cc
select Keyword_ID,Keyword_ID as HotWord_ID,HotWord from A_ForthcomingBasicInfo where ValidFlag='1' ORDER BY UpdateDateTime desc limit 0,10
